page.title: 20Hopes for the future for E/C
page.content:
Some local people were asked what their hopes were for the future of East Calder.Some of the answers are listed below.
A new shopping centre Sports complex with a swimming pool No litter and vandalism More plays,concerts and musical activities Employment for all More community involvement with everyone working together for a better place to live. THE END Written by the children of class 7A East Calder Primary School with contributions from Kirknewton Primary School.Many thanks to Mrs Gillon for her help in the classroom,and parents and friends for their interest.
